betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe blood altar is the main crafting mechanic in blood magic.

The altar has multiple tiers. You can use the inspectoris scandalum to see the template for each tier.

You will need to fill the altar with LP to craft the various mob items.

You can right click the sacrificial dagger to use your HP to fill the altar.

You can kill mobs with the dagger of sacrifice to use their HP to fill the altar.

When you can afford making one, you should use the ritual of culling to automate LP!

Even later on, digital mob agonizers will produce LP at a fast rate!
